briefdescription.para: sets the GCLK enable bit in the GPIO register to a certain value

parameterdescription.para: An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
The value of the GCLK enable bit

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: reads the input value of the GPIOs

parameterdescription.para: An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
The value of the input GPIOs

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: wait until the input GPIOs have a certain value

parameterdescription.para: An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
the value to compare the input GPIOs with

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: wait until a GPIO pin have a certain value

parameterdescription.para: An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
The pin number from 0 to 7
The value to compare the GPIO with

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: drives the output value of the GPIOs

parameterdescription.para: An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
value to be driven to output GPIOs

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: sets the direction of all GPIOs

parameterdescription.para: An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
GPIOs direction where 1 is output and 0 means input. It should be an eight bit value where each bit represents the direction of certain GPIO pin

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: gets the direction of all GPIOs

parameterdescription.para: An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
GPIOs direction where 1 is output and 0 means input. It should be an eight bit value where each bit represents the direction of certain GPIO pin

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: sets the direction of one GPIO pin

parameterdescription.para: An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
pin number from 0 to 7
GPIO pin direction where 1 is output and 0 means input.

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

detaileddescription.para:
returns the value of the Raw Interrupt Status Register
bit 0 P0HI : Pin 0 is high
bit 1 P1HI : Pin 1 is high
bit 2 P2HI : Pin 2 is high
bit 3 P3HI : Pin 3 is high
bit 4 P4HI : Pin 4 is high
bit 5 P5HI : Pin 5 is high
bit 6 P6HI : Pin 6 is high
bit 7 P7HI : Pin 7 is high
bit 8 P0LO : Pin 0 is low
bit 9 P1LO : Pin 1 is low
bit 10 P2LO : Pin 2 is low
bit 11 P3LO : Pin 3 is low
bit 12 P4LO : Pin 4 is low
bit 13 P5LO : Pin 5 is low
bit 14 P6LO : Pin 6 is low
bit 15 P7LO : Pin 7 is low
bit 16 P0PE : Pin 0 has observed a rising edge
bit 17 P1PE : Pin 1 has observed a rising edge
bit 18 P2PE : Pin 2 has observed a rising edge
bit 19 P3PE : Pin 3 has observed a rising edge
bit 20 P4PE : Pin 4 has observed a rising edge
bit 21 P5PE : Pin 5 has observed a rising edge
bit 22 P6PE : Pin 6 has observed a rising edge
bit 23 P7PE : Pin 7 has observed a rising edge
bit 24 P0NE : Pin 0 has observed a falling edge
bit 25 P1NE : Pin 1 has observed a falling edge
bit 26 P2NE : Pin 2 has observed a falling edge
bit 27 P3NE : Pin 3 has observed a falling edge
bit 28 P4NE : Pin 4 has observed a falling edge
bit 29 P5NE : Pin 5 has observed a falling edge
bit 30 P6NE : Pin 6 has observed a falling edge
bit 31 P7NE : Pin 7 has observed a falling edge

parameterdescription.para: An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
The value of the RIS register

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

returns the value of the Masked Interrupt Status Register

bit 1 P1HI : Pin 1 is high

bit 3 P3HI : Pin 3 is high
bit 4 P4HI : Pin 4 is high

bit 7 P7HI : Pin 7 is high

bit 11 P3LO : Pin 3 is low
bit 12 P4LO : Pin 4 is low
bit 13 P5LO : Pin 5 is low
bit 14 P6LO : Pin 6 is low
bit 15 P7LO : Pin 7 is low
bit 16 P0PE : Pin 0 has observed a rising edge
bit 17 P1PE : Pin 1 has observed a rising edge
bit 18 P2PE : Pin 2 has observed a rising edge
bit 19 P3PE : Pin 3 has observed a rising edge
bit 20 P4PE : Pin 4 has observed a rising edge
bit 21 P5PE : Pin 5 has observed a rising edge
bit 22 P6PE : Pin 6 has observed a rising edge
bit 23 P7PE : Pin 7 has observed a rising edge
bit 24 P0NE : Pin 0 has observed a falling edge
bit 25 P1NE : Pin 1 has observed a falling edge
bit 26 P2NE : Pin 2 has observed a falling edge
bit 27 P3NE : Pin 3 has observed a falling edge
bit 28 P4NE : Pin 4 has observed a falling edge
bit 29 P5NE : Pin 5 has observed a falling edge
bit 30 P6NE : Pin 6 has observed a falling edge
bit 31 P7NE : Pin 7 has observed a falling edge

parameterdescription.para: An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
The value of the MIS register

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

parameterdescription.para: An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
The required mask value

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

detaileddescription.para:
This function sets the direction of a specified set of pins in a GPIO port. Given a bit-packed representation of the pin(s), it sets the direction of the pin(s) to the required value.
All the specified pins are set to the same direction (dir).
The function does not affect the direction of the other pins in the port.
gpio
An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
pins
The bit-packed representation of the pin(s).
dir
The required direction value
status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: This function reads the data from a specified set of pins in a GPIO port. Given a bit-packed representation of the pin(s), it reads the data from the pin(s).

parameterdescription.para: An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
The bit-packed representation of the pin(s).
The data read from the pin(s)

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

detaileddescription.para: This function writes the data to a specified set of pins in a GPIO port. Given a bit-packed representation of the pin(s), it writes the data to the pin(s). Note that all the specified pins are set to the corresponding value of the corresponding bit in the data parameter.

parameterdescription.para: An EF_GPIO8_TYPE pointer, which points to the base memory address of GPIO registers. EF_GPIO8_TYPE is a structure that contains the GPIO registers.
The bit-packed representation of the pin(s).
The data to be written to the pin(s)

simplesect.para: status A value of type EF_DRIVER_STATUS : returns a success or error code

briefdescription.para: C file for GPIO8 APIs which contains the function Implementations.
